#summary P5-2b8 MouseEvents.getModifiers() reporting different values in differente OS's.

=Sketch showing how P5-2b8 MouseEvents.getModifiers() is reporting different things in different OS's=

Run the following sketch in different OS's under P5-2b8 using proscene-v.1.1.96 (_Tumaco_), and have a look at the output:

*WeirdCamProfile*

{{{
import remixlab.proscene.*;

Scene scene;
WeirdCamProfile wProfile;

void setup() {
  size(640, 360, P3D);
  scene = new Scene(this);
  // Customized camera profile:
  wProfile = new WeirdCamProfile(scene, "MY_PROFILE");
  scene.registerCameraProfile(wProfile);
  // Unregister other camera profiles (i.e., leave only MY_PROFILE):
  scene.unregisterCameraProfile("FIRST_PERSON");
  scene.unregisterCameraProfile("ARCBALL");
  scene.unregisterCameraProfile("WHEELED_ARCBALL");
}

void draw() {
  background(0);
  fill(204, 102, 0);
  box(20, 30, 50);
}
}}}

*WeirdCamProfile*

{{{
public class WeirdCamProfile extends CameraProfile {
  public WeirdCamProfile(Scene scn, String name) {
    super(scn, name);
    // Left mouse button works just fine:
    setCameraMouseBinding(LEFT, Scene.MouseAction.ROTATE);
    if (PApplet.platform == LINUX) {      
      setCameraMouseBinding(CENTER, Scene.MouseAction.ZOOM);
      setCameraMouseBinding(RIGHT, Scene.MouseAction.TRANSLATE);
    }
    // workaround to make it work under Windows (don't know anything about OSX):
    else {
      setCameraMouseBinding(Event.ALT, CENTER, Scene.MouseAction.ZOOM);
      setCameraMouseBinding(Event.META, RIGHT, Scene.MouseAction.TRANSLATE);
    }
  }

  @Override
    protected Scene.MouseAction cameraMouseAction(MouseEvent e) {
    Scene.MouseAction camMouseAction = cameraMouseBinding( e.getModifiers(), 
    e.getButton() );
    if (camMouseAction == null)
      camMouseAction = Scene.MouseAction.NO_MOUSE_ACTION;

    // We override this method for debugging purposes:
    String button = new String();
    if (e.getButton() == PApplet.RIGHT)
      button = "RIGHT ";
    else if (e.getButton() == PApplet.LEFT)
      button = "LEFT ";
    else if (e.getButton() == PApplet.CENTER)
      button = "CENTER ";
    println("Button: " + button +
      ", modifiers: " +
      DesktopEvents.getModifiersText(e.getModifiers()) +
      ", action bound: " +
      camMouseAction.description());

    return camMouseAction;
  }
}
}}}
